title: High Noon Lissandra
body:
So I wanted to make like angelic vs infernal skins of Ashe, Liss and Sej (imagine Bristle being a pegasus) so they would have a common skin theme other than Freijord....but High Noon Ashe came out with the angelic theme so werk High Noon it is hahaha hope you guys/gals enjoy the concept ty

https://imgur.com/9nsOw8L

replies.body: This is absolutely gorgeous and horrifying at the same time!  I can totally picture the bones grinding along as she moves the way that her ice does in the base skin.  I think it may lean a little too heavily into the angelic side of things, though.  I think I'd have preferred it if you went all-in on High Noon and made her this sick vulture-style desperado with leather and flames.
